flavor_text: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.
They intently observe both Trainers and Pokemon. Apparently they are looking at something that only Gothita can see.
It stares intently at everything. It can become so obsessed with watching that it doesn't notice attacks.
